reactor.bus.support

Class CallbackEvent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.bus.Event<T>
      • reactor.bus.support.CallbackEvent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the event payload
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Recyclable

    public class CallbackEvent<T>
extends Event<T>
    Simple Event implementation that attaches a callback to an Event and passes it to a delegate Consumer.
    Author:
    Stephane Maldini
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
